brief_summary.textblock:
This monocentric registry should provide information on the extent how patients with
      pulmonary diseases such as pulmonary hypertension will benefit from rehabilitation
      treatment. The data may provide a basis for further prospective studies showing the
      treatment of patients with pulmonary diseases especially by physical activation.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Study on Rehabilitation Patients With Pulmonary Hypertension and Other Pulmonary Diseases
clinical_study.condition: To Characterize Patients With Pulmonary Diseases in a German Rehabilitation Clinic

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Pulmonary Disease

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Inability or refusal to give written informed consent

study_pop.textblock:
All rehabilitation patients with pulmonary diseases in the Paracelsus-Harz-Clinic Bad
        Suderode will be included, starting December 2013,ending Novermber 2014.

oversight_info.authority: Germany: Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices

primary_outcome.description: Characterization of patients  with pulmonary hypertension and other pulmonary diseases in a german rehabilitation clinic.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
